name: Demonic Labyrinth
description:
Demonic Labyrinth is an Action Roguelike with RPG elements.

You find yourself in an endless closed labyrinth littered with a pile of earth and stones.
To get out, you have to clear your way and look for the right solution.
labyrinth, fighting off a crowd of undead, which has long been waiting for a victim.
According to the rules of the maze, one broken block that hid the enemy breaks
four blocks in the neighborhood and can create a whole chain that will clear the path for the hero, but
and create a small undead army.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Random level generation.
- Pumping the main character.
